text: @WhiteHouse @PressSec WHAT NOW! Do they want us to inject our children with chocolate, vanilla, butterscotch, lemon pudding (depending on your color of skin) as a cure for COVID-19 to send our children to school so Trump can get re-elected? https://t.co/M5j3ffoY8T
